Text: No seeder and unzipped. Totally worthless shit.
Finally got some seeders, downloaded it, clicked on it - nothing happens (on 10.6.8).
of course it doesn't work. I already said it was unzipped. duh.
you can fix it easily with BatChmod but  don't forget to check "apply to enclosed folders and files".

I find it hilarious that an obviously uneducated (i.e., "ignorant", "uncouth", and "rude") individual such as "m0ww0w" has the unmitigated gall, audacity, and outright temerity to post such a comment.

@m0ww0w ...

In other words, you silly, fucking muppet:

SHUT THE FUCK UP, YOU FUCKING BLEEDING, PUS-FILLED BOIL ON A CAMEL'S SHITTY ASSHOLE!!!

To get it working you have to change access of the file. Open Applications/Utilities/Terminal.app, type "chmod -R 777 " (without quotes) then drag the app to the window. Press enter. You're good to go.

However, there's a bug where the game wont go any further after killing an elite monster (or, some people reported, doing escort quests).
